00020 #include "RefCounted.h"
00021 #include "AtomicInteger.h"
00022 #include "JNIHelper.h"
00023 //#include "Logger.h"
00024 
00025 //VS_LOG_SETUP(VS_CPP_PACKAGE);
00026 
00027 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace ferry {
00028 
00029   RefCounted :: RefCounted()
00030   {
00031     mRefCount = new AtomicInteger(0);
00032     mAllocator = 0;
00033   }
00034 
00035   RefCounted :: ~RefCounted()
00036   {
00037     if (mRefCount)
00038       delete mRefCount;
00039     mRefCount = 0;
00040     if (mAllocator)
00041       JNIHelper::sDeleteGlobalRef((jobject)mAllocator);
00042     mAllocator = 0;
00043   }
00044 
00045   void
00046   RefCounted :: setJavaAllocator(void* allocator)
00047   {
00048     if (mAllocator)
00049       JNIHelper::sDeleteGlobalRef((jobject)mAllocator);
00050     if (allocator)
00051       mAllocator = JNIHelper::sNewGlobalRef((jobject)allocator);
00052     else
00053       mAllocator = 0;
00054   }
00055   
00056   void*
00057   RefCounted :: getJavaAllocator()
00058   {
00059     return mAllocator;
00060   }
00061   
00062   int32_t
00063   RefCounted :: acquire()
00064   {
00065     //VS_LOG_DEBUG("acquire: %p", this);
00066     return mRefCount->incrementAndGet();
00067   }
00068 
00069   int32_t
00070   RefCounted :: release()
00071   {
00072     //VS_LOG_DEBUG("release: %p", this);
00073     int32_t retval = mRefCount->decrementAndGet();
00074     if (!retval)
00075       this->destroy();
00076     return retval;
00077   }
00078 
00079   int32_t
00080   RefCounted :: getCurrentRefCount()
00081   {
00082     return mRefCount->get();
00083   }
00084 
00085   void
00086   RefCounted :: destroy()
00087   {
00088     //VS_LOG_DEBUG("destroy: %p", this);
00089     // by default just call the destructor
00090     delete this;
00091   }
00092 
00093   RefCounted*
00094   RefCounted :: copyReference()
00095   {
00096     this->acquire();
00097     return this;
00098   }
00099 
00100 }}}
